verses.verse: Whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and whoever <S%G3956><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> the Father <S%G1080><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> the [child] born <S%G1080><s%> of Him.

By this <S%G3778><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that we love <S%G25><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and observe <S%G4160><s%> His commandments. <S%G1785><s%>
For this <S%G3778><s%> is the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that we keep <S%G5083><s%> His commandments; <S%G1785><s%> and His commandments <S%G1785><s%> are not burdensome. <S%G926><s%>

For whatever <S%G3956><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world; <S%G2889><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> is the victory <S%G3529><s%> that has overcome <S%G3528><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> â€“ our faith. <S%G4102><s%>
And who <S%G5101><s%> is the one who overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> but he who believes <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

This <S%G3778><s%> is the one who came <S%G2064><s%> by water <S%G5204><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> not with the water <S%G5204><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but with the water <S%G5204><s%> and with the blood. <S%G129><s%>
And it is the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> who bears <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For there are three <S%G5140><s%> that bear <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and the water <S%G5204><s%> and the blood; <S%G129><s%> and the three <S%G5140><s%> are in agreement. <S%G1520><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> we receive <S%G2983><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is greater; <S%G3173><s%> for the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> that He has borne <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> His Son. <S%G5207><s%>

The one who believes <S%G4100><s%> in the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> in himself; <S%G846><s%> the one who does not believe <S%G4100><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has made <S%G4160><s%> Him a liar, <S%G5583><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has not believed <S%G4100><s%> in the witness <S%G3141><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has borne <S%G3140><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> His Son. <S%G5207><s%>

And the witness <S%G3141><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> us eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> is in His Son. <S%G5207><s%>

He who has <S%G2192><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the life; <S%G2222><s%> he who does not have <S%G2192><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> does not have <S%G2192><s%> the life. <S%G2222><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> to you who believe <S%G4100><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may know <S%G3609><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the confidence <S%G3954><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> before <S%G4314><s%> Him, that, if <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to His will, <S%G2307><s%> He hears <S%G191><s%> us.

And if <S%G1437><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that He hears <S%G191><s%> us [in] whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> we ask, <S%G154><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> the requests <S%G155><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have asked <S%G154><s%> from Him.

If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G3708><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> committing <S%G264><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> not [leading] to death, <S%G2288><s%> he shall ask <S%G154><s%> and [God] will for him give <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who commit <S%G264><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> not [leading] to death. <S%G2288><s%> There is a sin <S%G266><s%> [leading] to death; <S%G2288><s%> I do not say <S%G3004><s%> that he should make <S%G2065><s%> request <S%G2065><s%> for this. <S%G1565><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is sin, <S%G266><s%> and there is a sin <S%G266><s%> not [leading] to death. <S%G2288><s%>

We know <S%G3609><s%> that no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G3956><s%> who is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> sins; <S%G264><s%> but He who was born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> keeps <S%G5083><s%> him and the evil <S%G4190><s%> one <S%G4190><s%> does not touch <S%G681><s%> him.
We know <S%G3609><s%> that we are of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> lies <S%G2749><s%> in [the power of] the evil <S%G4190><s%> one. <S%G4190><s%>

And we know <S%G3609><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2240><s%> come, <S%G2240><s%> and has given <S%G1325><s%> us understanding, <S%G1271><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that we might know <S%G1097><s%> Him who <S%G228><s%> is true, <S%G228><s%> and we are in Him who <S%G228><s%> is true, <S%G228><s%> in His Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the true <S%G228><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
Little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> guard <S%G5442><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> from idols. <S%G1497><s%>
